About Me

A few things about myself...

BIO

Hello, I'm Angela Volstad, an aspiring front-end web developer and designer. I graduated from Northern Kentucky University with a BA in Media Informatics and a computer science minor. These fields helped me pursue both of my passions for digital design and computer programming. I've also worked as an front-end developer intern for a startup in Fort Thomas, KY. Below are some of my work.

Tutorgen Inc.

Front-end Developer/ UX Designer

My supervisors tasked me with creating a new design for their company website. I modified a template from templated.co and filled it with the company's background info and design ideas. I also created a wireframe for an educational mobile app game they planned on developing for kids with learning disabilities.

Personal Projects

Web Designer/Developer

A couple of personal projects I've done were redesigning sites I built for a class project. One site is a Beatles appreciation theme and the other is a travel blog of my time in the Philippines. The Philippines site is still a work in progress.

JavaScript-Based Game

Web Designer/Developer

I also created a game using JavaScript. In the game, you navigate Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer through forest a maze to find a missing present. Feel free to play it on my work page! I also drew and colored all the game elements myself.
